attributes.action: Stop making those stupid "knock off Nigel" TV ad's, people will always buy counterfeit goods; accept it and stop wasting our money making annoying advertisments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You must have seen these annoying ad's that act as if you will become a social outcast if you buy a counterfeit dvd, as if you are a real cheapskate for not further funding those multi million dollar film companies. Im not really advocating buying them, i'm saying approach it from a different angle becuase this one is stupid and doesnt work.
